objectives: Apply theoretical concepts to analyze cognitive science

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to cognitive science
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to cognitive science

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about cognitive science
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about cognitive science
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about cognitive science

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Quiet space with good acoustics and audio equipment

warm_up.description: Students listen to audio about cognitive science and share reactions

main_activities.description: Students receive information about cognitive science through auditory modality
Students practice language related to cognitive science using auditory approach
Students produce original content about cognitive science demonstrating intermediate thinking

discussion_prompts: How does cognitive science affect people?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of cognitive science?
How would you solve problems related to cognitive science?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for cognitive science
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to cognitive science

homework_options.required: Core assignment at intermediate level using auditory approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about cognitive science
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
